message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe I can offer you $130 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $140, but that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to offer you $135 for the product.
